scripts.bakeIcons: icons='keyMapsBindings';iSize='32'; cd /home/yoyo/Apps/icons; for i in $icons;do echo 'make icon: '$i; ./make_icon_resize.sh 'ico_'$i'_256_256.png'; cp 'ico_'$i'_'$iSize'_'$iSize'.png' '/home/yoyo/Apps/viteyss-site-keyMaps/assets/'; done;echo 'ok size: '$iSize; echo 'DONE';
scripts.mkBackup: fn=$npm_package_name"_v"$npm_package_version"_tt"`date +%y%m%d%H%M%S`".tar.bz2"; echo "name will be [$fn]";  tar --exclude=".git" --exclude="node_modules" -cvf "../"$fn ./; echo "Backup done: [$fn]"; ls -alh ../$fn
